# Get-Something

Source: `source/Public/Get-Something.ps1`

## Synopsis

Sample Function to return input string.

## Description

This function is only a sample Advanced function that returns the Data given via parameter Data.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Mandatory | Pipeline | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Data | String | Yes | Yes | The Data parameter is the data that will be returned without transformation.    |

## Examples

### Example 1

```powershell
Get-Something -Data 'Get me this text'
```
